interestingcomments.content: Depending on the actual date I'll be in. I sometimes get vertigo, so my trip up the Shard might be a very brief one!

interestingcomments.content: ... I think I'm also going to look at the cost of including Amman (Jordan) as a side trip... I was thinking of including Armenia as a side trip, but transport is very difficult (indirect) due to conflicts with Turkey. We're considering Greece or another Turkish location, but now that you mention it, Jordan would also be wonderful.

interestingcomments.content: Sounds interesting but again timing would be an issue for me as I usually go away towards the end of August. Two trips in short time would severely harm my cashflow!
